mapper.sql: a.id, a.userId, b.`name` as "userName", b.user_type, (SELECT c.label FROM trains.sys_dict c WHERE c.`value` = b.user_type AND c.type = 'sys_user_type') AS "remarks", a.title, a.name, a.desc, a.bengtime, a.endtime, a.templatetype, a.authtype, a.publisherpass, a.playpass, a.checkurl, a.barrage, a.foreignpublish, a.openlowdelaymode, a.showusercount, a.audit_status, a.create_date, a.audit_user, a.isPay, a.imgurl, a.live_remarks, r.roomId as "roomId", a.earnings_ratio as "earningsRatio", a.is_open as isOpen, a.is_show as isShow, a.is_open_role AS isOpenRole, a.is_recommend as isRecommend, a.del_flag
mapper.select: SELECT , y.id AS "category.trainLiveCategoryId", y.parent_id AS "category.parent_id", y.parent_ids AS "category.parent_ids", y.name AS "category.name", y.type AS "category.type", GROUP_CONCAT(f.id) AS companyIds, GROUP_CONCAT(f.`name`) AS companyNames FROM trains.train_live_audit a LEFT JOIN trains.train_live_category y ON a.category_id = y.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user b ON a.userId=b.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_dict c ON c.`value`=b.user_type LEFT JOIN trains.train_live_room r ON r.userId=a.userId LEFT JOIN trains.train_live_jurisdiction j ON a.id = j.audit_id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_franchisee f ON j.company_id = f.id WHERE a.del_flag=0 AND y.del_flag = 0 AND c.type='sys_user_type' AND a.id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE train_live_audit SET category_id = #{category.trainLiveCategoryId}, audit_status=#{auditStatus}, isPay=#{isPay}, live_remarks=#{liveRemarks}, earnings_ratio = #{earningsRatio}, is_open = #{isOpen}, is_show = #{isShow}, is_open_role = #{isOpenRole}, audit_user=#{auditUser} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE train_live_audit SET audit_status = 0, live_remarks = '审核未通过', audit_user = '超管' WHERE id=#{id}

SELECT
FROM trains.train_live_audit a LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user b ON a.userId=b.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_dict c ON c.`value`=b.user_type LEFT JOIN trains.train_live_room r ON r.userId=a.userId WHERE a.del_flag=0 AND c.type='sys_user_type' AND a.audit_status = 1 AND a.bengTime <= SYSDATE()

SELECT
FROM trains.train_live_audit a LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user b ON a.userId=b.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_dict c ON c.`value`=b.user_type LEFT JOIN trains.train_live_room r ON r.userId=a.userId WHERE a.del_flag=0 AND c.type='sys_user_type' AND a.audit_status = 2 AND SYSDATE() < a.bengtime AND a.bengtime <= date_add(SYSDATE(),INTERVAL 5 MINUTE)

SELECT id AS 'trainLiveSkuId', audit_id AS 'auditId', user_id AS 'userId', price, num, type, create_date AS 'createDate', update_by AS 'updateBy', update_create AS 'updateCreate' FROM trains.train_live_spec WHERE audit_id = #{auditId}
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}

SELECT audit_id AS 'auditId', user_id AS 'userId', price, num, type, create_date AS 'createDate', update_by AS 'updateBy', update_create AS 'updateCreate' FROM trains.train_live_spec WHERE id = #{trainLiveSkuId}
SELECT price FROM trains.train_live_spec WHERE audit_id = #{id} AND type = 1

SELECT a.id, b.name AS "userName", r.roomId AS "roomId", a.title, a.desc, a.bengtime AS "bengTime", o.name AS "organization.name", a.user_earnings AS "userEarnings", a.earnings_ratio AS "earningsRatio", a.platform_earnings AS "platformEarnings" FROM trains.train_live_audit a LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user b ON a.userId=b.id LEFT JOIN trains.train_live_room r ON r.userId=a.userId LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office o ON o.id = b.office_id WHERE a.audit_status IN (3,5) AND a.del_flag=0
AND b.name like '%'||#{userName}||'%' CONCAT('%',#{userName}, '%')
AND b.mobile = #{mobile}
AND (o.id = #{organization.id} OR o.parent_ids LIKE CONCAT('%,', #{organization.id}, ',%'))
AND a.title like '%'||#{title}||'%' CONCAT('%',#{title}, '%')
ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(b.integral_earnings),0) AS integral FROM sys_office_account b
mapper.update: UPDATE trains.train_live_audit SET is_recommend=0 WHERE is_recommend = 1
UPDATE trains.train_live_audit SET is_recommend = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM trains.train_live_audit a WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND a.category_id = #{trainLiveCategoryId}

SELECT a.id, a.category_id AS 'category.trainLiveCategoryId', a.title, a.`name`, a.`desc`, u.id AS 'userId', u.`name` AS 'userName', r.roomId FROM trains.train_live_audit a LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user u ON a.userId = u.id LEFT JOIN trains.train_live_room r ON u.id = r.userId LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office o ON u.office_id = o.id WHERE a.category_id = #{category.trainLiveCategoryId} AND a.del_flag = 0
AND u.name LIKE '%'||#{userName}||'%' CONCAT('%',#{userName}, '%')
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' CONCAT('%',#{title}, '%')
AND a.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND u.mobile = #{mobile}
AND o.id = #{organization.id}
ORDER BY a.id
mapper.update: UPDATE trains.train_live_audit SET category_id = #{categoryId} WHERE id = #{auditId}
